name: SwordGrip-BibleMemory
0:
”Alexa, launch Sword Grip.”
”Alexa, ask Sword Grip to read the Titus verses.”
”Alexa, ask Sword Grip to change my default translation to the English Standard Version”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sword grip
des: Supports KJV, NKJV, and ESV. This skill is for those memorizing in Scripture Memory Fellowship's Sword Grip program. Review your verses anytime! Just ask Alexa to review the verses for Matthew, or any other book of the New Testament.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
